MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Develop a Climate Neutral Agri- Food System so that by 2050, the Climate Impact of Methane is Reduced to Zero and Remaining Agricultural Emissions are Balanced by Removals; and Improve Air Quality
ACTION STATEMENT: Ireland will play a leading role in  shaping how greenhouse gas emissions  from livestock farming are understood  and addressed.

MISSION STATEMENT: An Innovative,  Competitive &  Resilient Agri-Food  Sector, Driven by  Technology and  Talent
GOAL STATEMENT: Develop a Dynamic Knowledge Exchange Environment
ACTION STATEMENT: Strengthen primary producer  advisory and extension services to  cover environmental and climate  performance, innovation and  digitalisation, as well as agronomic,  animal health and welfare, technical  and financial aspects.
